remarks: A finite permutation group is generated by the transpositions, see also Theorem 3.4 in [Rotman] p. 31.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
symgtrf.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
symgtrf.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
symgtrf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
symggen.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
symggen2 $p |- ( D e. Fin -> ( K ` T ) = B ) $.
